name: 360jobinterview.com
overview: 360JobInterview.com provides LIVE one-on-one services (including interview coaching, career coaching, and personal resume services) via the Internet to prepare people looking to successfully obtain or change jobs. Our proprietary technology platform handles scheduling, billing and communication between coaches and consumers and leverages VOIP technology (provided via Skype). We have currently assembled a network of over 300+ human resource professionals hailing form 55+ different industry groups from companies such as American Express, Hyatt, Marriott, Dell, Macy’s, Time-Warner and Verizon. Our network also includes numerous multi-lingual coaches
